name: Mouse-Man
text: And here I thought you'd be a gonner

name: Mouse-Man
text: Now don't look so scared, I'm the one who saved you

name: Mouse-Man
text: Didn't you humans build some sort of lift in these caves not long ago?

name: Mouse-Man
text: Even though bats and slimes have overrun that place not long ago, it's still functional.

name: Mouse-Man
text: It's down on lv 6, I think

name: Mouse-Man
text: All you need to do is go down this hole, go through the cave system and reach that lift!
